statements: SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT species_name, location FROM BiodiversityData WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT id, species_name, conservation_status FROM BiodiversityData WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT species_name, location, timestamp FROM BiodiversityData WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT species_name, location FROM BiodiversityData WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered' AND location != 'Ocean';
SELECT COUNT(id) AS Total_Count, conservation_status FROM BiodiversityData GROUP BY conservation_status HAVING COUNT(id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData;
SELECT id, species, location FROM BiodiversityData WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT species, date_observed FROM BiodiversityData ORDER BY date_observed DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE conservation_budget > 5000;
SELECT conservation_area, start_date, end_date FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY species ASC, date_observed DESC
SELECT species, location FROM BiodiversityData WHERE species = 'Eagle' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-06-30' ORDER BY conservation_budget DESC
SELECT conservation_area, start_date, end_date FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE conservation_budget > 5000 ORDER BY conservation_area ASC
SELECT id, date_observed FROM BiodiversityData WHERE location = 'Forest' ORDER BY date_observed ASC, id DESC
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM Species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT observer_name, observation_date FROM Observations WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, species_type, endangerment_level FROM Species WHERE endangerment_level = 'Critically Endangered';
SELECT area_name, location FROM ConservationAreas WHERE protection_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE species_type = 'Mammal';
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM Species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConservationAreas WHERE location LIKE '%Park%';
SELECT observer_name, observation_date FROM Observations WHERE observation_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT species_name, area_name FROM Species s JOIN Observations o ON s.species_id = o.species_id JOIN ConservationAreas c ON o.area_id = c.area_id WHERE s.endangerment_level = 'Critical' AND c.protection_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_data ORDER BY date_observed DESC;
SELECT species_name, location FROM biodiversity_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT species_name, location, date_observed FROM biodiversity_data WHERE location = 'forest';
SELECT * FROM conservation_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM conservation_projects WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_data WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest'
SELECT species_name, date_observed FROM biodiversity_data WHERE date_observed > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY date_observed DESC
SELECT location, COUNT(*) as total_species FROM biodiversity_data GROUP BY location
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM conservation_projects ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation, expertise FROM researchers WHERE expertise LIKE '%ecology%'
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT name, classification, kingdom FROM Species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Observations WHERE observer_name = 'John Doe' AND observation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT name, description FROM Habitats WHERE name LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT * FROM Species ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, classification FROM Species WHERE kingdom = 'Animalia';

SELECT observation_id, species.name, Locations.name AS location FROM Observations JOIN Species ON Observations.species_id = Species.species_id JOIN Locations ON Observations.location_id = Locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM ConservationStatus WHERE status = 'Endangered' OR status = 'Critically Endangered';

SELECT observation_date, Species.name AS species, Locations.latitude, Locations.longitude FROM Observations JOIN Species ON Observations.species_id = Species.species_id JOIN Locations ON Observations.location_id = Locations.location_id ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
